post:
Shines Host is a Web hosting company. We are dedicated in providing the best supported web solution out there. We provide everything from Web Hosting to Resellers to Dedicated Servers.

Last month was a good month. We got a lot off new happy customers, since that is what we like we will give you another month of amazing prices.
This month we would like for you to tryout our services, what we will do to make this easier is giving you a special offer.
As always we would like some feedback.

Resellers: OCT10RESELL - This offer gets you 35% off on whatever reseller package you would like. Get additional 2 months free when you pay annually.

Hosting: OCT1020HOST - This offer allows you to get 50% off on our web hosting offers for the first month.

Dedicated Servers: Finally our dedicated Servers. We are proud of our dedicated servers and we would like to offer you 2 more ip´s witch in total is 4 included ip´s. No Setup Fees.

We are now offering TrialPay: Get any of our Bronze, Silver, Gold Hosting. Bronze or Silver Reseller for free!

TrialPay is best known for its “Get It Free” payment model, in which consumers get an item for free from a participating merchant by completing an offer from a TrialPay advertiser.

All our services come with the following:
We Guarantee 99.9% uptime.

Our server runs on a 1GPS port to give fast website load.

All our services are managed and we offer 24/7/365 support.

We offer Live Support to offer that next level of support.

All Hosting and resellers come with cPanel 11. Most used professional Hosting Control panel.

Our Servers is Located in the United States in a reliable Tier 4 Data Cetner.
